Package it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.comm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncChannel
    Classes implementing this interface represent active on-going connections between two devices, in a similar fashion to Channel.
    Channel
    Classes implementing this interface represent active on-going connections between two devices.
    Connection<C extends Channel>
    Classes implementing this interface allow connecting to some devices.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothConnection
    This class implements a Connection between the Android device and the EV3 via the Bluetooth protocol.
    Bytecode
    This class is a low-level buffer for creating commands to be sent to the EV3 device.
    Command
    This class implements a command for the EV3 device.
    Const
    Constants for low level encoding of commands and replies.
    Packet
    Abstract class that serves as a superclass for Command and Reply.
    Reply
    This class implements a reply for the EV3 device.
    SpooledAsyncChannel
    This class implements an asynchronous channel that sends commands and receives replies via a spooler thread.
    SpooledAsyncChannel.FutureReply
    This class implements a Future over a Reply object specifically tailored for the SpooledAsyncChannel outer class.
